results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = P(n,k)/2, n >= 2, 1 <= k < n, of one-half of number of permutations of 1..n such that the differences have k runs with the same signs.

formula: Let P(n, k) = number of permutations of [1..n] with k "sequences". Note that A008970 gives P(n, k)/2. Then g.f.: Sum_{n, k} P(n, k) *u^k * t^n/n! = (1 + u)^(-1) * ((1 - u) * (1 - sin(v + t * cos(v))-1) where u = sin(v).
mathematica: p[n_ /; n >= 2, 1] = 2; p[n_ /; n >= 2, k_] /; 1 <= k <= n := p[n, k] = k*p[n-1, k] + 2*p[n-1, k-1] + (n-k)*p[n-1, k-2]; p[n_, k_] = 0; t[n_, k_] := p[n, k]/2; A008970 = Flatten[ Table[ t[n, k], {n, 2, 11}, {k, 1, n-1}]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 03 2012, after given recurrence *)
